One jump strafe based gameplay made for legit normal settings (that means stamina scroll for the uninitiated). It is intended to be played on 100 tick, sv_airaccelerate 100, fps_max 300, sv_gravity 800 and no scout / 250 run speed. To experience the map how it was meant to be played, visit [http://steamcommunity.com/groups/_strafe](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/_strafe "http://steamcommunity.com/groups/_strafe") for a list of legit normal servers.

Originally designed to be a bonus stage for badges3, but didn't fit. Also contains a short speedrun bonus map.


<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Y3NRt-b_baQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

And it might have some other visual glitches. Idgaf. I probably even spelled the name wrong, but cant be bothered fixing. Cant remember any testers, cause my memory is real bad atm.

This first map that I started, though it has been remade in the last few months.  The only section that hasn't really been remade is the first section.  I started it to experiment with new bhop ideas, since I was tired of the typical corridor-style levels and same box platforms over and over.  This map is intended for play with sv_airaccelerate 100.

There is a "duel" mini-game just in case you get tired or frustrated with bhopping and need a break.  Two players enter the red teleports and have to shoot the targets above eachother's head.  

There are a few secret items spread around.  The 'kite' gun boosts you when you press e.  When pressed right after jumping, you can get some lift and jump long distances.  There are two in the map: one on the boxes at the end and one at the end of the long jump which will only spawn after completing the map.  These guns can be respawned every 10 minutes and will kill the current gun being used.

In the longjump, a "secret" scout can be picked up after 255 and will respawn 5 minutes after pick up.  After 260, the anti-bhop platforms are removed.  The LJ goes to 266, though my current best is 264.

bhop_antieuclid_v2 is my third bhop map.

Why the v2? I had it tested on a server, and some people pointed out some bits were a little harder than necessary, so I nerfed them.


Features:
  • 5 Unique Stages (In difficulty order of easy, hard, medium, hard, easy)
  • Bits of geometry that don't make sense
  • A decent aesthetic
  • No leaks
  • func_detail brushes
  • Multihop platforms (Or just stand on them, there's no teleport)

FAQ:

Q: I'm lost, where do I go?
A: When in doubt, go back the way you came

Q: How did you make this?
A: Hammer editor

Q: Can you make me a map?
A: No

Q: You're a smelly loser kys
A: Thanks

_sText: SHORT QUICK SPEED RUN MAP

My internet was down for a few days so I challenged myself to make a  map. Works on CS:S and GMod perfectly from what I've tested, other games unknown. The map can be finished in under 20 seconds, so it's a very short map. I can post the VMF if there's any interest.

Gotta do my shout-outs now, peace to:
Telstra, for the shitty internet which inspired me to make this map
VHS-7 Community, for map testing.

Jumpy jargon, I joust like Jacare jivin. Japanese Judo and Jiujitsu,
killin em like a kid... got a Kilogram of Ketamine for Kwanza
in a knitted Kimono made out of Komodo Dragon skin.

_aChangeLog.text: Fixed a bug - when, when moving to another level, you were thrown in different directions
Bug fixed - you could make doubleboost
Added new items at all levels
At the 1st level, the number of blocks is increased and the speed is reduced from the boost to improve the gameplay

A bhop map that's out of this world! Made for auto or scroll. It's medium to hard difficulty, about 1:30 in a casual auto run and about 40 seconds to speedrun. I added a lot of shortcuts and different possibilities for routing. There's a ~15sec strafe bonus too if you're into that kind of thing.
Much better than my first one
cyka blyat

Short and fairly easy bhop map which concentrates on scenery and detail whilst giving you an enjoyable gameplay experience. Nothing I tried too hard on, it's still "just" a bhop map, but I hope you like playing it! Some parts of the skybox mess up and display parts of the map you are not supposed to see, but you won't even notice it unless trying to.

The map contains custom textures but I had to delete the nature soundscapes due to an unknown problem with the wave file. They were supposed to contain tropic jungle sounds and cute birds but since they didn't work I is cri :'(

Also Gamebanana doesn't like reuploads so the .rar file is named bhop_ancient_3 because of me reuploading it. The map file inside will be the same for everyone.

The bonus can be placed on top of the wide stone pillar next to the wooden pegs you can see in the 5th screenshot. This spot is accessible. Or just come up with your own bonus.

Possible on scroll

!Be sure to leave feedback below so I can further improve my maps or make a fixed version of this one!

I would love to hear some **constructive criticism**, I am waiting to fix all the small details that need to be fixed, which I didn't notice. 

So yeah, please let me know of anything. 

- also I do know the glass is purple in my screenshots. I hope that's only my problem, otherwise let me know and I will look into it.

Been a while since i made a glow map and i had this lying around so i thought id finish it, its similar to bhop_purpleglow in terms of size and length, however it has some different obstacles than my previous maps so i hope that will be interesting. Not really much to say, all should be pos on scroll if u like playing that but id recommend to play it on auto since it will flow better.  I believe the map should be around 1 minute and 30 seconds long.

Huge thanks to Asko and Mad for testing the map multiple times and Promises for letting me test the map on his server.

My 3rd and biggest map. No trigger on blocks. Not possible legit. Custom textures. I couldn't think of a name so named it after a friend.

I took a lot of time to make this map back when I was bhopping pretty regularly, but now that I don't really bhop anymore I figured I would just finish it and put it on here. Sorry for the abrupt ending to the map.
